articles.title: Tesla Has Reportedly Been Using Bots Since 2013 to Manipulate Stock Prices

articles.content: One of the most controversial facets of social media is how much influence a single user can have on how people view real-world happenings. On Twitter in particular, the surge of trending topics and … [+2544 chars]
